title: O come, O King of nations, bind

author.name: Henry L. Gilmour
author.bio: Henry L. Gilmour was a dentist by profession and a hymn writer who contributed many hymns to Christian hymnody.

lyrics:
O come, O King of nations, bind
in one the hearts of all mankind.
Bid all our sad divisions cease
and be yourself our King of Peace. Refrain
I AM TRUSTING THEE, LORD
JESUS
